title: Beyond Bones: How Encounters with Neanderthals Rewrote Our Genetic Destiny
snippet: Explore how interbreeding with Neanderthals left a lasting mark on our DNA, influencing everything from immunity to behavior. Insights into human evolution.

title: The Brain's Secret Snack Code: How Dopamine Neurons Hijack Your Cravings (And How Science Is Fighting Back)
snippet: Discover how dopamine neurons in the brain's reward system drive compulsive snacking, why weight-loss drugs like semaglutide sometimes fail, and what ancient survival instincts reveal about modern obesity. A deep dive into the neuroscience of pleasure-driven eating.
